name: Joustrich
description:
Slip into your favourite armour, grab your sturdiest lance and mount your trusty ostrich! Joustrich is a local multiplayer platformer that pitches 2 - 4 players against each other in an epically silly struggle of knights steering ostriches and throwing lances each other.

There is a shocking lack of games featuring these beautiful creatures known as ostriches. We aim to fill this gap. Additionally, Joustrich exhausts the possibilities of whacky movement controls that bird-based movement combined with twin-stick shooter-like combat offers.

Steering those damned birds
  • While not airborne your ostrich can accelerate towards high speed and move to the left/right
  • Ostriches can jump and flutter a little bit through the air
Stick ‘em with the pointy end
  • At the same time as moving you need to control your weapon and aim at the enemy knights
  • You can thrust your lance forward to throw it at the enemies
  • After throwing the lance it sticks in the ground and you have to go and retrieve it!

(It only works with XBOX Controllers for now!)

Joustrich was developed as a student project at the University of Applied Sciences in Salzburg.
